data.text: @neontaster I don't see anything wring with what he wrote. I'm not saying the CDC deserves a defence for everything they do, but what he wrote is bloody obvious.
@neontaster Welp, I just got the name for my next create-a-player. Thanks @neontaster

@neontaster The elite panic over COVID pivoting to the elite panicking over suffering an identity criss as their Twitter schtick becomes entirely meaningless is going to be the source of incredible schadenfreude.
@WhoisJaneGalt @neontaster Someone needs to create a quiz game where they show you the Covid numbers and you guess the policy response. It would be totally nonsensical.
@neontaster We need a “what horse will James beat next” pool.
@neontaster They're also going to pretend the masks and mandates worked and numbers like these don't exist. https://t.co/s6wZ5Csosr

@neontaster If anything, places that did not have mandates and masks, did better or the same as places that did have them. 

All people have to do is remember that in November. Vote for people who encourage freedom.
@neontaster When does he think the Rogan controversy happened? May 2020?
@neontaster Dude, I'm here liking Tom Nichols tweets, today is just all wrong.
